meanings.definition: The branch of biology that deals with the normal functions of living organisms and their parts.
meanings.sent1: Studying physiologies helps us understand how living things work.
meanings.sent2: Doctors need to learn about different physiologies to treat patients effectively.
meanings.sent3: The physiologies of plants can be quite fascinating to explore.
meanings.sent4: The intricate physiologies of the human body are like a complex puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: In school, we learned about the diverse physiologies of animals in our biology class.

meanings.definition: The functions and activities of living organisms and their parts.
meanings.sent1: The physiologies of cells play a crucial role in our overall health.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the physiologies of different species helps in conservation efforts.
meanings.sent3: Sometimes, the physiologies of animals can seem like a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent4: The physiologies of a community can be compared to the gears of a clock, each part essential for the whole.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the physiologies of insects reveals a world of fascinating adaptations.
